IEnumerable< bool > unify (object arg)
 If arg is another Functor, then succeed (yield once) if this and arg have the same name and all functor args unify, otherwise fail (don't yield). If arg is a Variable, then call its unify to unify with this. Otherwise fail (don't yield).

Static Public Member Functions

static object make (Atom name, object[] args)
 Return an Atom, Functor1, Functor2, Functor3 or Functor depending on the length of args. Note that this is different than the Functor constructor which requires the length of args to be greater than 3.

 Call the main make, first converting name to an Atom.

static object OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.Functor.make ( Atom  name,
object[]  args 
) [static]

Return an Atom, Functor1, Functor2, Functor3 or Functor depending on the length of args. Note that this is different than the Functor constructor which requires the length of args to be greater than 3.

IEnumerable<bool> OpenSim.Region.ScriptEngine.Shared.YieldProlog.Functor.unify ( object  arg  ) 

If arg is another Functor, then succeed (yield once) if this and arg have the same name and all functor args unify, otherwise fail (don't yield). If arg is a Variable, then call its unify to unify with this. Otherwise fail (don't yield).
